plan1.properties: Unlimited talk, text & high-speed data with no data caps!
plan1.linelimit: 8 ($10 per month per additional line, $20 for each line over 8 per month)
plan1.hotspot: Unlimited Hotspot data per line per month (throttled over 250GB per month)
plan1.text: Unlimited texting from U.S. to 200+ countries

plan2.text: Unlimited texting from U.S. to 200+ countries
